completeListOfAbilities.name: ドレイン
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを自身に加算＋HP攻撃
与えたHPダメージに応じて味方全員のHP極大回復
回復量の上限は それぞれの最大HPの20％分
自身に5ACTION「BRVリジェネ」付与

ailments.name: BRV Regen
ailments.desc: BRV Regen: Restores a certain amount of BRV

passives.name: Quick Drain
passives.desc: Slightly raises turn rate for Drain
passives.short_desc: Quick Drain: Raises turn rate of Drain

passives.name: Low BRV Initiative
passives.desc: Slightly raises SPD when BRV is below INT BRV
passives.short_desc: Low BRV Initiative: Raises SPD

passives.desc: Deals slightly more BRV damage when using chain attacks
passives.short_desc: Chain Bonus: Increases BRV damage dealt

passives.name: Bravery Wall
passives.desc: Upon using Wall:\n• Slight BRV increase
passives.short_desc: Bravery Wall: Increases BRV

passives.name: Initiative
passives.desc: Slightly raises SPD for 3 turns at start of each wave
passives.short_desc: Initiative: Raises SPD

passives.name: Charged Drain
passives.desc: Drain use +1
passives.short_desc: Charged Drain: Raises use count of Drain

passives.name: Buff Boost
passives.desc: Slightly raises MAX BRV with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buff Boost: Raises MAX BRV

passives.name: Charged Wall
passives.desc: Wall use +1
passives.short_desc: Charged Wall: Raises use count of Wall

passives.name: Life of Trabia
passives.desc: Slightly raises party's INT BRV、 MAX BRV while HP is at least 50% of MAX
passives.short_desc: Life of Trabia: Raises party's INT BRV、 MAX BRV

passives.name: All Buffed Attack Boost
passives.desc: Slightly raises party's MAX BRV、 ATK with active buffs
passives.short_desc: All Buffed Attack Boost: Raises party's MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Drain Extension
passives.desc:
Drain use +1

When using Drain:
• Slightly increased BRV based on MAX BRV
• Slightly increased HP recovery based on HP damage
• Slightly increased HP recovery limit
• 5 turns BRV Regen
passives.short_desc: Drain Extension: Boost to Drain

passives.name: Last Boost
passives.desc: Slightly raises MAX BRV if HP is MAX at start of last wave
passives.short_desc: Last Boost: Raises MAX BRV

passives.name: Wall Extension
passives.desc:
When using Wall:
 • Slight Wall buff boost
 • Moderate INT BRV Up boost
 • 6 turns MAX BRV Up II

After using Wall:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (tremendous BRV damage boost) for 6 turns
passives.short_desc: Wall Extension: Boost to Wall

passives.name: Shatter Resonance
passives.desc: Slightly raises party's INT BRV、 MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: Shatter Resonance: Raises party's INT BRV、 MAX BRV

passives.name: Ability Recovery Extension
passives.desc: When using Ability Recovery:\n • Grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV\n • Slightly restores party's HP
passives.short_desc: Ability Recovery Extension: Boost to Ability Recovery

passive.name: Ability Recovery Growth
passive.desc: When using Ability Recovery:\n • Grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV\n • Slightly restores party's HP
passive.short_desc: Ability Recovery Growth: Boost to Ability Recovery

passive.name: Attack & Support
passive.desc:
When using Drain:
• Increased BRV gain based on MAX BRV
• Turn rate+
• Increased HP recovery limit
• HP recovered in excess of MAX HP based on HP damage dealt added to BRV

passive.name: Soaring Walls
passive.desc: When using Wall:\n • Wall buff、 INT BRV Up extended to party、 boost、 duration+\n • Grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV

passive.name: Stage of Dreams
passive.short_desc: Stage of Dreams: May equip Aura

passives.name: Aura BRV Rejuvenate
passives.desc: When using Aura:\n • Slight boost to BRV granted based on own MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: Aura Rejuvenate: Increases BRV granted with Aura

passives.name: Aura Recast Up
passives.desc: Slightly raises recast speed of Aura
passives.short_desc: Aura Recast Up: Raises recast speed of Aura

passives.name: Stage of Dreams HP+
passives.desc: While equipping EX weapon Crescent Wish (VIII) or passive ability Stage of Dreams:\n • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (grants party BRV based on HP damage dealt)
passives.short_desc: Stage of Dreams HP+: HP Attack becomes HP Attack+

passive.name: 夢の大舞台エクステンド
passive.desc: EXアビリティ「オーラ」の性能アップ
passive.short_desc: 夢の大舞台エクステンド：「オーラ」の性能アップ

passives.name: オーラBRVヒールアップアドバンス
passives.desc:
「オーラ」使用時
・自身の最大BRVに依存したBRV加算量小アップ
・加算したBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限はそれぞれの最大BRVの120％分
passives.short_desc: オーラBRVヒールアップアドバンス：「オーラ」の性能アップ

passives.name: 夢の大舞台エクステンドアタックアップバフスタート
passives.desc:
クエスト開始時
味方全員に3ACTION強化効果「オーラ」付与

EX+武器「クレセントウィッシュ(VIII)+」
またはパッシブ「夢の大舞台エクステンド」装備時
自身の攻撃力大アップ
passives.short_desc: 夢の大舞台エクステンドアタックアップバフスタート：攻撃力がアップし クエスト開始時 味方全員に強化効果「オーラ」付与

passives.name: オーラHPヒールプラス
passives.desc: 「オーラ」使用時\n味方全員のHPを小回復
passives.short_desc: オーラHPヒールプラス：「オーラ」の性能アップ

passives.name: オーラバフアップ＋＋
passives.desc:
強化効果「オーラ」に
対象の奪ったBRVと加算したBRVを
最大BRVを超えて加算する上限小アップの効果追加

「HP攻撃＋」が「HP攻撃＋＋」に変化し
・HP攻撃前
　自身に自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
・加算したBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
passives.short_desc: オーラバフアップ＋＋：強化効果「オーラ」の効果アップ 「HP攻撃＋＋」に変化
